value:
$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Yoo-hoo! You're that crew from
Askr, I'm guessing?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. And...who are you?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'm Jötunheimr's princess royal.
You can call me Dagr!$k$p$EFace|You want that magic sword Niðavellir
gave us, don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Th-that's right! We're desperate and
need its power. Will you help us?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Pass!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wha— Huh?! Why? We need it!
Without Gramr, we're lost!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Sounds like your problem! I missed
the part where I should care. Moving
on to things that matter...$k$pIf I defeat you, no one will doubt
how strong I am! Then I'll be the
next queen! Get it?$k$p$EFace_Anger|Besides, I'm the better daughter by
FAR—even if Mom never stops talking
about Nótt, Nótt, Nótt... UGH!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Umm... Is this relevant?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Oh, right! Sorry! I must make no
sense to you...but you'll die here,
so no use explaining!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Let the carnage BEGIN! Time to
meet Skinfaxi! You're all about
to be crushed!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This is a peace-loving person?!
What nonsense!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Huh... Guess I lose! You guys really
are super strong. No fair! Boooo!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Care to explain exactly what is going
on here, Princess Dagr?$k$pWe were on our way to meet with
Princess Nótt...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Yeah, sure. Nótt's my twin sister.$k$pMom says whichever one of us is
stronger when it's her time to step
down gets to be the next queen, so...$k$p$EFace_Smile|I figured if I took out the royal
families of both Askr and Niðavellir
in one go, the throne would be mine.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|So we've been caught up in the
midst of a competition between
twin sisters?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Yep. Sorry 'bout that. But you won
anyway, so no harm done, right?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yikes! What a scowl. You know, you'll
never get a girlfriend making faces
like that!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, wow! How'd you make it even
scowlier! I said I'm sorry already!$k$pHow about this... As a reward for
beating me, I'll help you get that
sword. Sound good?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You'll...help? Should we be expecting
some kind of problem? I had heard
Princess Nótt is quite sensible...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Look. Just trust me, all right? You're
headed to Barnstokkr, aren't you?
I'll do you a favor and come with!$k$pNo problem with that, is there?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...I suppose it would be for the best.
We've learned Jötunheimr princesses
may not be so trustworthy, after all...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Heehee! Oh, my sweet little prince,
you don't need to be so shy about it.$k$pYou can just admit that traveling with
with such a beautiful princess would
be a great honor for you! *wink*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I've never seen Alfonse's brow quite
so furrowed before!$k$p$EFace_Cool|I can't wait to see how this plays out!
Should be fun, wouldn't you say so,
$Nu? Heehee.$k$p$Sbs150|
